A/7
V/7   (Dark and grainy. Quality varies depending on screen size; on a 42" screen it would score about a 6, maybe less.)

BOTTOM LINE:

If you're going into this file hoping for a smooth experience like i.e. Cars 2 (video-wise, the movie itself wasn't too great) or any other recent movie, you're going to be disappointed. But if you're used to watching stuff in not so great quality, like cams or TS, than this will be very watchable for sure.
